settings.heading: Our designer program members receive exclusive pricing to interior designers and architects (20% off retail pricing).
settings.top_text: If you'd rather contact us directly, please email support@Porteandhall.com with any questions.

settings.heading: “As an interior designer, I believe deeply in the importance of your home's ability to brighten your mood and outlook.”
settings.text: — STAFFORD MEYER, FOUNDER OF PORTE + HALL

settings.heading: Meet Stafford, founder of Porte + Hall
settings.text: “In my 20 years as an interior designer, I struggled to source entry mats that were as well-designed and functional as the rest of the home. I was bewildered by the scarcity of options. Why was the first thing to greet you at your door not important? So I decided to design my own - because first impressions matter, for you and your guests.  Welcome to our collection and we hope you walk all over us!”

settings.title: What is your refund policy?
settings.answer:
All orders are shipped within 7 business days. Shipping is available in the continental United States. Porte + Hall ships with UPS, USPS and FedEx. Porte + Hall does not ship to PO Boxes. Shipping is not available to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico or U.S. Virgin Islands. We currently do not ship to international destinations. Shipping rates vary based on size and weight of the box and number of boxes in an order. Payment methods we accept: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal and Apply Pay. Once an order is placed, you will receive a confirmation email. Once your order has shipped, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with tracking information. If you do not receive a tracking number please contact support@porteandhall.com.

We will accept returns within thirty (30) days of order placement for a full refund. Goods must be returned unused in original packaging. Shipping charges will be deducted from the original form of payment.

If you need to return an item, please visit our returns portal where you will be able to generate a pre-paid return label. The return shipping fee will be deducted from your total refund.
